title: Ali Jabbari
text:
Ali Jabbari is a retired <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">Midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Iran%20national%20football%20team">Iran</a> in the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a> . He also played for <a href="Taj%20SC">Taj SC</a>.
On 13 May 1972 during a group match at the <a href="1972%20AFC%20Asian%20Cup">1972 AFC Asian Cup</a>, Iran were trailing 0-2 vs <a href="Thailand%20national%20football%20team">Thailand</a>. Ali Jabbari turned the match around with a <a href="hat-trick">hat-trick</a> in the space of 8 minutes, with goals in 80', 86' and 88', giving Iran first place in the group. He scored again in the final which Iran won vs. <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20football%20team">South Korea</a>.
